title: SOUND DESIGN:
info: Our sound design team will provide a world-class audio experience according to the occasion and needs.

title: INVITATION & RSVP MANAGEMENT:
info: Our crew takes care of invitation and RSVP. Through this, we can estimate the expected number of guests and make preparations accordingly.

title: BUDGET DEVELOPMENT:
info: Cost-cutting and effective procedures can be provided by us if needed.

title: CRITICAL PATH DEVELOPMENT:
info: Pay for the damages is applied to all the services/items we provide(like a chair, table, LED screen, etc.).

title: VENDOR CONTRACT NEGOTIATION:
info: Because of our network and connections with multiple companies, we can provide many services and cater to many events even in peak season.

title: CATERING CONSULTATION:
info: We can connect you to the desired chefs, catering and staff that you require.

title: EVENT STAFFING:
info: Event location, atmosphere and audience are taken into consideration when we provide staff tailored for you.

title: MEDIA RELATIONS:
info: Our personnel will take care of announcements and broadcasting the event on media like TV, radio, newspaper, etc.

title: SPONSORSHIP MANAGEMENT:
info: Our company will provide sponsors for you that are appropriate for your event.

title: TALENT PROCUREMENT:
info: Our team is connected with internal talent pools and  has partnerships with staffing suppliers, outsourcing service firms and independent contractors. It ensures that we never run out of high-quality staff.

title: VIDEO PRODUCTION MANAGEMENT:
info: Our video production team consists of experts who deliver top-notch video quality in post-production.

title: MULTIMEDIA PRODUCTION MANAGEMENT:
info: Our experts take care of Presentations, Graphics, Motion Graphics, Opening Videos, Awards, Categories Videos, Custom Screen Content, Loops/Sponsor Loops, Digital Signage, etc.

title: HOSPITALITY & TRAVEL:
info: You won't have to undergo the hassle of making several bookings as we take care of the venue, hotel accommodation and travel arrangements for guests according to your requirement.

title: PROTOCOL & CONCIERGE ACTIVATION:
info: We provide security services for the event. We provide a reliable staff team for guiding and assisting guests when they reach the venue.

title: TOTAL EVENT LOGISTICS:
info: Logistics of the entire event consisting of the event venue, staffing and post-production multimedia is taken care of by us.
